title: Energy efficient Appliances, Wood Inspired Flooring*, Linen Closets
map_address: 540 W Horizon Ridge Pkwy near West Horizon Ridge and Las Palmas Avenue
posting_body: This is a 3 Bedroom, 2.5 Bath, approximately 1172 Sq.
Our beautiful views of the Las Vegas valley and the rugged skyline of Black Mountain provide the perfect backdrop for living at The Townhomes at Horizon Ridge in Henderson, NV.
Along with an appealing community of luxury townhomes, our community was designed to compliment the surrounding neighborhood and landscape.
First impressions count- and you are definitely going to be awe-struck.
Our resort-style swimming pool and spa area include a charming cabana with barbeque grills for relaxing with friends and neighbors.
You’ll also enjoy some fun outdoors with our built-in corn hole game and ping pong table.
Or, curl up in a comfy lounge chair under a palm tree for some well-deserved rest and relaxation.
With all of Las Vegas at your feet, living here is your ideal choice for your new home.
All of this belongs to you at The Townhomes at Horizon Ridge!

Ceiling Fans in Master Bedroom, Newly Renovated Townhomes Available*, Private Balconies & Patio*, Energy efficient Appliances, High Vaulted Ceilings, Attached 2-Car Garage in every Townhome, Eat-in Dining Room, Wood Inspired Flooring*, Gas Oven & Cooktop, Stainless-Steel Appliances*, Central Air Conditioning & Heating, Spacious Walk-in Closets, Equipped with full-size Washer & Dryer, Linen Closets, Lofts available in 2 Bedroom Floorplans*, Garden Style Tubs
specials and availability subject to change daily.
Parks and Hiking Trails Nearby, Curbside Trash & Recycling Services, 24-Hour On-Call Emergency Maintenance, Boat & RV Parking, 24-Hour Fitness Center, 24-Hour Pool & Spa, Dog Park
Applicants must qualify 2.5 times the rental amount.
